message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the problem of organizing news content in an online fashion, which involves tasks such as event detection, clustering, and story structure generation. These tasks are closely related to several sub-fields of computer science, including information retrieval (cs.IR), natural language processing (cs.CL), machine learning (cs.LG), social and information networks (cs.SI), and computational journalism (cs.CY). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper.
